title: I get no help
body: This server is SHIT, like the shittiest server. On NA and EUW i used to get great help, either its the people in OCE who help or the server itself that sucks. I am from Bangkok, Thailand, the lowest ping i have gotten was 140ms like 5-6 months back, since then the ping has gone to 300ms and whenever i ask for help in the support section, they just keep asking me for same shit again and again, the stupid network analysis and other reports. I AM DONE, check your freaking servers. check the connection of your servers with my city, because I play many other games and in none of those game, there is time that my ping goes so high. Take a stand for once in your lifetime you oceanic losers, and check your servers.

replies.body:
Well, I personally thought the service provided here for assistance was sub-par. Feels like I'm talking to robots who have short-term memory.

Now, in order to help you, I have to ask you for some details (unfortunately). It's not like I can access your e-mail log or anything.

Could you provide your ISP, OS, rough computer specs and any things you've tried in the past to improve your speed?
